post.author: 권경화
post.content:
Subject: Contract Opportunity Date: Fri, 23 Jul 2004 14:13:15 -0400 From: "Tanya McMillan" <tmcmillan@integritycanada.com> Add to Address BookAdd to Address Book To: kwon96@yahoo.com
Hi Fred,
As discussed, one of our clients (in Etobicoke) in searching for a J2EE Developer to join them on a 6-9 month contract. They are developing an Order Management System.
Responsibilities Include:
- Demonstrated broad experience with a variety of technologies andarchitectures.
- Has held previous development positions.
- Work with a team of 2-6 developers to ensure that project objectives are met.
- Participate in team meetings and offer suggestions etc.
- Apply a structured development process.
Qualifications/Requirements:
- 5 years software development experience including at least 5 years experience in developing and integrating J2EE server applications using Java, JSP, BEA Web Logic Integration, MS SQL, XML, XSLT.
- Strong database skills, store procedures & triggers.
- Minimum 3 years experience working with a team of developers
Skills / Background:
-Good written and verbal communication skills.
-Experience with Java, J2EE Application Servers and the above mentioned technologies.
-Good understanding of current best practices in enterprise application development.
If you or anyone you know is interested in discussing this current opportunity please contact me ASAP.
Thanks,
Tanya
Tanya McMillan
Integrity Canada Inc.
135 Queen's Plate Drive, Suite 380
Toronto, Ontario M9W 6V1
Phone: 416-747-5959 x 27
Fax: 416-747-8786
E-mail: tmcmillan@integritycanada.com
Web: www.integritycanada.com
Staffing Specialists
Projects * Contracts * Placements
post.title: J2EE Developer
